description: Lists connections. In Amazon DataZone, a connection enables you to connect your resources (domains, projects, and environments) to external resources and services.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to list connections.

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project where you want to list connections.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListConnections action.

nested_items.name: connectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of a connection.

nested_items.description: The domain ID of a connection.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of connections is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of connections, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListConnections to list the next set of connections.
